"it's not bsc node" - it's too abstract definition of problem. 
Please open new issue with:
- clear description of problem
- Erigon version
- description of your infrastructure (Docker? Cloud? OS?)
- some recent logs
- error message


Also - re-check all next ports are open on your firewall: https://github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon#default-ports-and-protocols--firewalls
